name: Mars-64
description:
Your mission is to wait 10 minutes for the rescue to arrive, while you try to survive and the neighboring aliens who visit

If there are any errors, please report

Controls:

1..5-change construction

P-pause

Mouse-lol

1-Cultivation, 2-Machine that makes water, 3-Bed (Heals life), 4-potato, 5-tree

Game by JAFYgames
